title: How to get free lap dances at the strip club - Quora

response.answer_text: You don’t? Women who WORK as dancers are there to make money. Dances is how we make money, we don’t get any form of wages from the club itself - infact we pay to work there. No dances, no money, no money, no rent and so on Sex Workers work their asses off to make a living, Being a dancer is so emiotionaly and physically taxing and requesting dances for free is a waste of time and also disrespectful of the industry
